pullRequest.title: Made minor corrections to all KeyVault READMEs.
pullRequest.bodyText: I was looking into a customer-reported issue about our samples (#10457) and noticed we could polish our READMEs a little.

commit.message: Made minor corrections to all KeyVault READMEs.

nodes.bodyText: Instead of \n, it is preferred to use %n because it will give a platform-dependent new line.
Also, a nit I guess but we do follow printf() pattern for samples in other libraries.
do we need the explicit toString()?

commit.message: Fixed minor grammar issues and added quotation marks where needed.

Add azure-data-appconfiguration as an AdditionalModule to Keyvault (#13647)

(cherry picked from commit b75d7322d3f44f311a08425c817c7804e7600432)
Made minor fix for the sake of consistency.
